column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The salad and pizza are five stars!  Their limited menu allows them to focus on getting the food right
column2: and they have succeeded.  My only complaint was their weak wine selection.  Ten wines to choose from. Many different brand names
column3: but all brands were owned or imported by Gallo.  The restaurant could certainly offer a higher quality wine selection
column5: command a higher price for a glass or bottle.  The restaurant goes to such effort to make good food
column6: but is lazy when it comes to the wine list.  A missed opportunity for Lou Malnati's.
